name: Changed 3D
description:
What is Changed 3D?

Changed 3D is a 'remake' of game created by DragonSnow and Shizi as music creator.

Link to the  original game: Save 60% on Changed on Steam (steampowered.com)

What is the difference?

Except that this is 3D and was created using Unity. There is almost no difference, I just changed small details like dialogs. But it's better if you play the original first.

What about performance?

Well, this game uses HDRP with reflections that are set to max. And other post processing options. So this game will definitely not work on a microwave. But I am also working on a version that will be less demanding*

*microwave still unsupported

Why did you release an unfinished game?

I want to see if anyone visits this site at all....

Have an idea or something else?

In comments you can write what do you think about this game and your suggestions. Also bugs reports are welcome.

More informations

If you want to know more about this project and me you can visit this site:

Changed 3D (google.com)
